content: this legal case took place in the municipal court of bjelovar it involved a dispute over several properties including a house agricultural building threshing floor and arable land the proposer jk was awarded a majority share of 3140 while the counterparty bb received a smaller share of 940 the proposer will pay the counterparty an amount of 4186000 hrk for their share party a is required to pay 78 eur to the municipal court b within 15 days for the decision to become final once the payment is made party a will have ownership rights for the properties the court based its decision on article 51 of the property act allowing party a to initiate proceedings to terminate coownership initially party a proposed dividing the properties or compensating party b with 940 of the market value however after a hearing party b agreed to accept 1000000 eur as compensation the courtappointed expert disagreed with the market value assessment and determined that party a has a stronger claim to the properties due to inheritance the court ordered party a to compensate party b with 23 of the market value totaling 4186000 hrk the courts decision is final
